item.title: Leesa add a quote by John Scalzi
item.description: "Here's a quick rule of thumb: Don't annoy science fiction writers. These are people who destroy entire planets before lunch. Think of what they'll do to you." -- John Scalzi

item.title: Leesa add a quote by John Scalzi
item.description: "If you want me to treat your ideas with more respect, get some better ideas." -- John Scalzi

item.title: Leesa add a quote by John Scalzi
item.description: "I am not responsible for actions of the imaginary version of me you have inside your head." -- John Scalzi

item.title: Leesa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Leesa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The man in black fled across the desert, and the gunslinger followed." -- Stephen King

item.title: Leesa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description:
"I do not aim with my hand; he who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I aim with my eye.
I do not shoot with my hand; he who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I shoot with my mind.
I do not kill with my gun; he who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father. I kill with my heart." -- Stephen King

item.title: Leesa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Time's the thief of memory" -- Stephen King

item.title: Leesa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "First comes smiles, then lies. Last is gunfire.-Roland Deschain, of Gilead" -- Stephen King
